main.name: Omaro Grant
main.bio: Hello there, my name is Omaro Grant and I'm a dedicated JavaScript developer who lives to create new things. I am passionate to work with a great companies and help them fullfill their goals by scaling it to this next level. I have gain multiple skills over the past years and also build cool projects. I wish for in the future to work on real world projects so i can get my hands on real world experience and the skills required to succed as a web developer out in the world
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be a part of the PAPA fam!

education.school: Vocational and Taining Development Institute - JM
education.degree: Bachelor's Degree, Information and Communication Technology

work.title: Founder and CEO
work.description: Cloning all the apps possible. On the way to clone the world! Building the PAPA Fam as large as possible.

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
